description:
Legcord is a custom client designed to enhance your Discord experience while keeping everything lightweight.


What's Changed
- Disable autogain setting has been re-added
- You can now set the desktop icon through Legcord settings
Full Changelog: https://github.com/Legcord/Legcord/compare/v1.0.3...v1.0.4
Big thanks to @SomeAspy, @FlintSH  and @fluffypony for their donations
